text: Mr. Clean is a 1996 Indian Malayalam-language film directed by Vinayan and starring Mukesh and Sreenivasan in the lead roles.http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/mr-clean.html ==Plot== ==Cast== * Mukesh as Rajagopal * Sreenivasan as Mahadevan * Madhupal * Rajan P Dev as Madavan Thampi * Annie as Nandhini * Devayani as Nirmala * Harishree Ashokan as Aymootti * Bindu Ramakrishnan * Anila Sreekumar * Zeenath as Savithri * N.F Varghese as Doctor Alex * Sadiqque as Doctor Joseph Mathew * Kottayam Nazeer as Attender Velayudhan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Vinayan
title: Mr. Clean (film)
